roleset.name: move ungracefully
roleset.note: TRUNDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'trundle' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion. (from trundle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``Of course it's better to sell private,'' he says, as the butcher trundles away.
